duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Leader in achieving the store’s budgeted sales and profit goals.
Ensure 100% pricing accuracy and facilitate the unloading and stocking of merchandise according to operational guidelines.
Maintain well-stocked inventory counts and appropriate staffing levels for receiving and processing stock.
Ensure backroom and equipment is organized and clean per operational standards and perform routine housekeeping tasks.
Train and develop partners on proper receiving, processing, and stocking procedures.
Perform all aspects of point-of-sale service, cash sales, credit and check sales, and returns and exchanges.
Directly supervise the Merchandise Operations Specialists and lead and coach all store partners in providing great guest service.
Ensure that the store is opened and closed in accordance with established procedures and adhere to and promote established safety procedures.
Assist with location changes needed to maximize sales and provide training and coaching to store partners in Guest and product knowledge.
Assume responsibility as Leader on Duty (LOD) as needed.
